key.name: note-font
key.description: The font notes will be displayed in

key.name: note-font-monospace
key.description: The font code will be displayed in

key.name: note-max-width
key.description: Use a fixed width for the text area of a note

key.name: theme-oled
key.description: Makes the dark theme pitch black

key.name: toolbar-enabled
key.description: Displays the formatting toolbar at the bottom of the note

key.name: cheatsheet-enabled
key.description: Adds a button to the markdown reference sheet on the right of the formatting toolbar

key.name: enable-3-pane
key.description: Expands the notebook list to include the notebook name

key.name: notes-dir
key.description: Where the notebooks are stored (requires app restart)

key.name: trash-dir
key.description: Where the trash folder is located (requires app restart)

key.name: show-line-numbers
key.description: Displays line numbers at the left of the note

key.name: show-all-notes
key.description: Displays the "All Notes" notebook at the top of the notebook list

key.name: enable-autosave
key.description: Automatically saves the current note every 30 seconds if the contents have changed (requires app restart)

key.name: disable-hidden-trash
key.description: The trash folder is set as a hidden folder by default, this option makes it visible

key.name: note-sort-order
key.description: The sort order of the note list

key.name: notebook-sort-order
key.description: The sort order of the notebook list

key.name: url-detection-level
key.description: How aggressive to look for URLs in markdown text

key.name: line-spacing
key.description: The line spacing for the note text
